sentences.en: After a year we will sympathetically consider an application for reinstatement.
sentences.cn: 一年后我们会对复职申请予以考虑和批准。

sentences.en: De Gaulle vetoed Britain's application to join the EEC.
sentences.cn: 戴高乐驳回了英国加入欧洲经济共同体的申请。

sentences.en: Fill out the application carefully, and keep copies of it.
sentences.cn: 仔细填写申请表，并且保存副本。

sentences.en: He received a letter saying that his application had been rejected .
sentences.cn: 他收到一封信，告知他的申请已被拒绝。

sentences.en: His application to the court for bail has been refused.
sentences.cn: 他向法庭申请保释遭到拒绝。

sentences.en: How do the two techniques compare in terms of application?
sentences.cn: 这两种手法实际运用起来哪个好一些？

sentences.en: I filled in the application form and sent it off.
sentences.cn: 我填完申请表后把它寄了出去。

sentences.en: I’ve put in an application for a transfer.
sentences.cn: 我已递交了调动申请。

sentences.en: It can take a long time for your visa application to be processed .
sentences.cn: 办理签证申请可能需要很长时间。

sentences.en: Many loan application forms automatically add on insurance.
sentences.cn: 许多贷款申请表自动附加保险。

sentences.en: Send a full CV with your job application.
sentences.cn: 随求职申请书寄上详尽的个人履历。

sentences.en: Some application forms can be incomprehensible to ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 有些申请表格一般人可能看不懂。

sentences.en: Thank you for your letter of application , which we received yesterday.
sentences.cn: 你的申请信昨天收悉，谢谢。

sentences.en: The application form is important. Sit down and write it out properly.
sentences.cn: 申请表十分重要，坐下来好好填写。

sentences.en: The application forms have now been simplified.
sentences.cn: 申请表格现已简化了。

sentences.en: The application of fertilizer increased the size of the plants.
sentences.cn: 施肥后植株长得更高大了。

sentences.en: the applications of genetic engineering in agriculture
sentences.cn: 基因工程在农业上的应用

sentences.en: The Council is currently reviewing the way it deals with planning applications .
sentences.cn: 市政会目前正在审查其处理规划申请的方式。

sentences.en: The district council agreed with the objectors and turned down the application.
sentences.cn: 区政务委员会同意反对者的意见，拒绝了这一申请。

sentences.en: The membership application came before the Council of Ministers in September.
sentences.cn: 会员申请书于9月提交部长会议审议。

sentences.en: The regulation has no application to this particular case.
sentences.cn: 那项规则不适用于这一特定情况.

sentences.en: The research has many practical applications .
sentences.cn: 这项研究有许多实际用途。

sentences.en: They filed an application to have their case heard early.
sentences.cn: 他们申请早日审理他们的案子.

sentences.en: Tickets are available on application.
sentences.cn: 票可以通过申请获得。

sentences.en: We receive hundreds of job applications each year.
sentences.cn: 我们每年收到数百封求职信。

sentences.en: You have to submit your application before the end of the month.
sentences.cn: 月底之前必须递交申请。

words.tran_cn: 可适用的；可应用的；合适的
适用的；有用的；可应用的

phrases.tran_cn: 现场应用；野外使用；预涂涂装

trans.tran_cn: 申请，请求，申请书，运用，生效，应用软件，勤奋，努力，涂抹，施用
trans.tran_en: a formal, usually written, request for something such as a job, place at university, or permission to do something
